Load Data

```{r, include=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(knitr)
library(broom)
library(gt)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(purrr)
library(tidyr)

```

```{r}

roi_fa_allgender <-  read_csv(here("data", "raw", "rawdata_manuscript_FA.csv")) |>
  rename(
    age  = Age...6,
    factor1 = `Factor 1.y`,
    factor2 = `Factor 2.y`,
    iq   = IQ.x,
    sus  = `Total Drug Use`,
    pclr = `PCL-R Total`, 
  ) 

roi_fa_male <-  read_csv(here("data", "raw", "rawdata_manuscript_FA.csv")) |>
  filter(Gender == 0)|>
  rename(
    age  = Age...6,
    factor1 = `Factor 1.y`,
    factor2 = `Factor 2.y`,
    iq   = IQ.x,
    sus  = `Total Drug Use`,
    pclr = `PCL-R Total`, 
  ) 

roi_fa_female <-  read_csv(here("data", "raw", "rawdata_manuscript_FA.csv")) |>
  filter(Gender == 1)|>
  rename(
    age  = Age...6,
    factor1 = `Factor 1.y`,
    factor2 = `Factor 2.y`,
    iq   = IQ.x,
    sus  = `Total Drug Use`,
    pclr = `PCL-R Total`, 
  ) 
```
## All Gender
Number of Participants

```{r}
n_distinct(roi_fa_allgender$subject_id)
```

Age 
```{r}
range(roi_fa_allgender$age, na.rm = TRUE)
mean(roi_fa_allgender$age, na.rm = TRUE)
```
IQ

```{r}
range(roi_fa_allgender$iq, na.rm = TRUE)
mean(roi_fa_allgender$iq, na.rm = TRUE)
```
PCL-R

```{r}
range(roi_fa_allgender$pclr, na.rm = TRUE)
mean(roi_fa_allgender$pclr, na.rm = TRUE)
sd(roi_fa_allgender$pclr, na.rm = TRUE)
```

Factor 1 
```{r}
range(roi_fa_allgender$factor1, na.rm = TRUE)
mean(roi_fa_allgender$factor1, na.rm = TRUE)
sd(roi_fa_allgender$factor1, na.rm = TRUE)
```

Factor 2
```{r}
range(roi_fa_allgender$factor2, na.rm = TRUE)
mean(roi_fa_allgender$factor2, na.rm = TRUE)
sd(roi_fa_allgender$factor2, na.rm = TRUE)
```

SUS
```{r}
range(roi_fa_allgender$sus, na.rm = TRUE)
mean(roi_fa_allgender$sus, na.rm = TRUE)
```
